entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
